analysis.description:
CrowdCoinPreICO.fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0x403860568bcd726ec403f8a1ca67f374e842f16c.sol#448-467) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- dev_multisig.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/14/0x403860568bcd726ec403f8a1ca67f374e842f16c.sol#460-461)

CrowdCoinICO.collect (/unique_chucks/14/0x403860568bcd726ec403f8a1ca67f374e842f16c.sol#546-551) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- dev_multisig.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/14/0x403860568bcd726ec403f8a1ca67f374e842f16c.sol#550-551)

CrowdDevAllocation.tokens_multisig (/unique_chucks/14/0x403860568bcd726ec403f8a1ca67f374e842f16c.sol#565-566) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- unlock (/unique_chucks/14/0x403860568bcd726ec403f8a1ca67f374e842f16c.sol)

CrowdDevAllocation.init (/unique_chucks/14/0x403860568bcd726ec403f8a1ca67f374e842f16c.sol#570-583) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(this) == 0 || initial_time != 0

CrowdDevAllocation.init (/unique_chucks/14/0x403860568bcd726ec403f8a1ca67f374e842f16c.sol#570-583) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(this) == 0 || initial_time != 0
CrowdDevAllocation.unlock (/unique_chucks/14/0x403860568bcd726ec403f8a1ca67f374e842f16c.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- unlocked[part] == true || block.timestamp < initial_time + unlock_times[part] || unlock_values[part] == 0

elements.expression: unlocked[part] == true || block.timestamp < initial_time + unlock_times[part] || unlock_values[part] == 0
